feed.subtitle: Jawatan Kosong Universiti 2021. Malaysia universities / education jobs 2021

entry.title: Jawatan Kosong Universiti Selangor Terkini
entry.content:
Jawatan Kosong Universiti Selangor Terkini

Maklumat iklan kerja kosong yang ditawarkan oleh Universiti Selangor.

Calon yang berkelayakan dan memenuhi syarat-syarat yang ditetapkan sila memohon untuk mengisi kekosongan kerja seperti yang diiklankan dibawah sebelum Tarikh Tutup: 30 November 2020.

Kekosongan

  • Penolong Pensyarah – Gred DA41
  • Pensyarah – Gred DS45

Kelayakan

Sekiranya anda, Warganegara Malaysia, berumur 18 tahun keatas yang berkelayakan dengan Ijazah, Diploma, Sijil Tinggi Persekolahan (SPM, STPM, “A” Level, Pre-U) atau Kelayakan Professional yang diiktiraf adalah di pelawa untuk memohon mengisi kekosongan jawatan di atas.

Selain itu calon juga perlulah mempunyai ciri-ciri berikut:

  • Berperwatakan menarik
  • Berpengetahuan
  • dan lain-lain (rujuk kelayakan permohonan di bawah)

Cara Permohonan

Klik pautan ‘Iklan Penuh Jawatan’ dibawah dan rujuk maklumat permohonan, syarat kelayakan dan tarikh tutup permohonan kerja tersebut. Calon yang disenaraikan pendek sahaja akan dipanggil temuduga.

Iklan Penuh Jawatan
entry.summary: Jawatan kosong Universiti Selangor terkini untuk kekosongan Penolong Pensyarah – Gred DA41,Pensyarah – Gred DS45

entry.title: UNIVERSITY OF CYBERJAYA Vacancies Faculty Administrator

link.title: UNIVERSITY OF CYBERJAYA Vacancies Faculty Administrator

entry.content:
UNIVERSITY OF CYBERJAYA is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Faculty Administrator position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

This job is responsible to plan, coordinate and control the provision of administrative and secretariat services within the Faculty in accordance with related policy, procedures and guidelines.

This includes provision of Office and Finance administration services; Secretariat services for faculty level management and working committees; and supporting the implementation of courses and programmes offered within the faculty.

Job Scope:

Office Administration

• Provide administrative services to the faculty including maintenance of registers, office correspondence, office stationery and supplies, asset management, event coordination and others as required in accordance with established office procedures.

• Maintain and monitor the faculty filing and records including students’ personal files and staff administrative records in accordance with document management guideline / ISO standards.

Secretariat for Faculty Meetings

• Provide secretariat services for the faculty level academic and management committees including meeting arrangement, compilation of papers and producing minutes of meeting to ensure proper documentations of meeting proceedings.

• Coordinate the compilation of papers to be tabled at institution level committees by the faculty to ensure compliance with the respective committee’s paper submission procedures and requirements.

Course Scheduling and implementation

• Assist Deputy Dean (Academic) in coordinating course scheduling / other arrangements between the various years, disciplines, faculties, centres and University departments.

• Supervise the preparation and scheduling of academic calendar for all programmes in the Faculty to ensure it records in detail the academic activities and executed as scheduled.

Faculty Assessments and Examinations

• Take precautions and maintain the safety and confidentiality of question papers in accordance with the university standards and guidelines.

• Coordinate provision of logistics including assisting staff/invigilators/simulated patients/equipment and other paraphernalia as required for clinical/professional examinations.

Financial Administration

• Coordinate the preparation and implementation of annual budget for the faculty with necessary cost/expense/budget controls for effective use of resources in accordance with financial procedures.

• Provide feedback to Dean’s office and faculty on financial performance and budget utilization to ensure faculty expenses are within the approved budget.

Skills and Competencies:

• Proactive and can work independently with minimum supervision

• Able to communicate & write in Bahasa Malaysia & English

• Must be computer literate and good in Microsoft Word & Excel.

• Minimum Degree in any Social Science discipline, preferably with Administration or Information Management qualifications.

• Minimum 2-3 years of experience in managing administration, or management in an educational industry.

Company Overview

University of Cyberjaya (UoC) is a top-tier university in Malaysia as reflected in the latest Malaysian Qualification Agency’s SETARA ratings which has accorded UoC a Tier 5 (Excellent) rating on par with leading public universities. Established in 2005, the university is located in Cyberjaya, Malaysia’s first smart-city on a 5 acre, modern, fully equipped, green-friendly campus. The campus is surrounded by lush greeneries and provides a serene, conducive environment for student living and learning.
UoC now offers more than 20 programmes including degrees and masters and doctorate level postgraduate research courses in a wide variety of disciplines including medical sciences, pharmaceutical sciences, psychology, physiotherapy, homeopathic medical sciences, biomedical technology engineering and business among others.
In the knowledge industry, an institution’s greatest assets are its employees. We are committed to the development and growth of our employees and will continue to provide the necessary support and motivation in an ever evolving industry. And that is why we are the 2015 Gold Winner for the prestigious US-based Workforce Magazine’s Optimas Award for Managing Change.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream education sector job in Cyberjaya.
Apply Online
entry.summary: UNIVERSITY OF CYBERJAYA is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Faculty Administrator which positioned at Cyberjaya

entry.title: GPL Group of Companies Vacancies STANDARDS AND COMPLIANCE – EXECUTIVE

link.title: GPL Group of Companies Vacancies STANDARDS AND COMPLIANCE – EXECUTIVE

entry.content:
GPL Group of Companies is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for STANDARDS AND COMPLIANCE – EXECUTIVE position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

RESPONSIBILITIES:
  • To develop, review and implement operational policies, procedures and guidelines.
  • To ensure ongoing compliance with quality and industry regulatory requirements.
  • Work closely with the training team to plan, design and implement new training programs, to achieve the desired learning outcomes and organizational requirements.
  • Collaborate with Business Unit Heads and HR to recommend and develop effective procedures, policies and training programs geared to the business needs and to ensure continuous assessment of staff competency skills and gaps.
  • Responsible for conducting monthly checks/audits at all our  facilities, to monitor the quality of customer service provided and also the standard set for the upkeep of our facilities.
  • To document all monthly report on facilities checks/audits properly and present at EXCO meetings.
  • Identify areas for service and facilities improvement, make recommendations to the management.
  • Investigate customer complaints and non-compliance issues.
  • General administration and other ad-hoc assignments may be added from time to time.
REQUIREMENT:
  • Must possess at least a Diploma/Bachelor’s Degree in Hospitality, or a related field (essential).
  • A minimum 3-4 years experience in training, development management or hospitality industry.
  • Excellent written and communication skills in English, Malay and able to converse in Chinese dialects will be an added advantage.
  • Good and high level of competence with Microsoft PowerPoint, Excel & Word.
  • A self-motivated person, able to multi-task, a good  team player with effective inter-personal, communication, analytical, planning, and organizational skills.
  • Have the ability to demonstrate a positive, resourceful, creative, flexible, with  high adaptability to changing priorities, demands, possess a high level of responsibility and  integrity.
  • Must possess own transport and be willing to travel outstation as and when required.
BENEFITS:
  • Attractive remuneration package according to relevant experience and qualifications.
  • Group personal accident, hospitalization and surgical Insurance for confirmed staff.
  • Season parking provided.

Company Overview

We are a group of Companies in the leisure & entertainment industry with a strong presence in Malaysia. We are seeking for a dedicative, proactive and ambitious professional to be a part of our vibrant team.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream education sector job in Kuala Lumpur.
Apply Online
entry.summary: GPL Group of Companies is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the STANDARDS AND COMPLIANCE – EXECUTIVE which positioned at Kuala Lumpur
